title:
Quasiconformal reflection with respect to the boundary of an isosceles
  trapezoid
abstract:
We establish an upper estimate for the coefficient of quasiconformal
reflection with respect to the boundary of an arbitrary isosceles trapezoid in
terms of its geometric parameters; the estimate improve the result obtained in
the recent paper by S.~Nasyrov, T.~Sugawa and M.~Vuorinen.
